item.description:
Hi folks! Let's get together with a group of friends and do some outdoor walking while we tap our feet waiting for spring! This Meetup will take place at Sleeping Giant State Park which is a state park located in Hamden, CT. Snow is no deterrent, barring treacherous driving conditions . . . though we can all hope we've reached the melting point by now!

$2 DONATION: Please contribute a minimum donation of two dollars towards the fee that is charged by the Meetup Website.  Please email organizer directly and in advanceif you have questions or concerns regarding this suggested donation.  Please also note that members who arrive without donations for any reason have always been welcomed with warmth and without question.

WHEN AND WHERE: As usual, plan to arrive five minutes early.

Meet at the big trail map at 11:55 or 12:00 and head out at five after.

DIRECTIONS: Please see Sleeping Giant State Park website.
item.how_to_find_us: Sarah (Organizer) will meet you by the big trail map.

group.name: New Haven Walks in the Woods

item.name: New Haven Hikers' Walk at Sleeping Giant
